Text: I'm just getting started!
Whoa, who are all \n these people?
While in-between jobs, \n I'm serving as a \n martial arts trainer.
Oh, cool. You have \n your own dojo!
Say, would you mind \n giving them some \n sparring practice?
Sure thing! Always nice \n to get a good workout.
Obviously, busting out \n my gravity powers is a \n no-no...
But how easy should \n I go on them?
H-Hey, she's making \n fun of us!
Hey, I can't help it \n if I'm so powerful.

If you're so confident, 
 how about taking on a 
 hundred of my best 
 students?
You have a hundred \n students!?
A-Alright, that's fair. \n And I won't have \n to hold back.
Show them what \n you can do.
Bring it on!
I'll take every last one of you down!
I'm getting into this!
Keep it coming!
Halfway there!
I can do this all day!
That's the last of 'em.
Fight Fi's 100 Disciples
Fi: \n Begin!
Alright, come at me!
Disciples Left
Fighting Spirit
Fi: \n That's enough!
Okay, just so we're \n clear. We're about to \n have a 1 vs. 100 fight.
Fight off my \n students as \n they come at you.

But no gravity powers, 
 no leaving the arena, 
 and no falling in the 
 lake.
Got it! A hundred, huh? \n I better give it all \n I've got.
Phew, that's the \n last of 'em!
There's still one left.
Huh? Who?
Me. How about \n a game of B'oarack?
Sure! But if I'm \n fighting you, there's no \n way I'm holding back.
You never cease \n to amaze me.
Today taught my \n students... and me a \n valuable lesson.

We look forward to our 
 next fight, after 
 we've had some more 
 time to train.
Sure, anytime \n you're ready!
Take 3 Bells from Fi
Disciple: \n Begin!
Disciple: \n That's enough!
